sentences.english: It may survive and give rise to two mononucleate hybrid cells called synkaryons .
sentences.chinese: 可存活并产生两个称为合核体的单核的杂种细胞。

sentences.english: Number of grain per panicle indirectly influenced ratooning ability through No.
sentences.chinese: 每穗粒数通过有效穗数间接影响杂种再生力。

sentences.english: According to the heterotic theory, the algorithm made multi-populations concurrently evolve.
sentences.chinese: 根据杂种优势理论的原理，算法让多个种群同时进化。

sentences.english: The two mongrels were without spirit at all; bones were the only things breakable about them.
sentences.chinese: 而那两条杂种狗则没精打采的，只有一把骨头。

sentences.english: Ovary culture of hybrid embryos was used at early phase and 128 seedlings were obtained successfully.
sentences.chinese: 通过对早期杂种胚胎的子房培养，获得128株小苗。

sentences.english: There are two ways in utilization of heterosis in rapeseed .
sentences.chinese: 油菜杂种优势利用途径主要有三系法和两系法。

sentences.english: Using the heterosis is one of the important ways in breeding cultivars.
sentences.chinese: 利用杂种优势是作物育种重要途径之一。

sentences.english: But even doing all that wasn't enough to satisfy the bastard Republicans.
sentences.chinese: 但是就这些也不能让共和党的杂种们满意。

sentences.english: Reasons for the low translocation of the assimilate to grains of ISHR were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对亚种间杂种物质运转率低的原因进行了讨论。

sentences.english: Master Blifil called Tom a beggarly bastard.
sentences.chinese: 比利菲大师调用汤姆一乞丐杂种。

sentences.english: The main exceptions to this are hybrid and polyploid speciation.
sentences.chinese: 对于这一点，最主要的例外是杂种和多倍体物种。

sentences.english: You're a peppy little spit-fuck, aren't you?
sentences.chinese: 你是个精力充沛的小杂种，是吧？

sentences.english: In plants, chimaeras produced from two different species are known as graft hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 在植物中，嵌合体是由两个不同的嫁接杂种产生的。

sentences.english: The rate of survival for hybrid seeds, was obviously increased, by the treatment of the irradiation.
sentences.chinese: 辐照对杂种籽粒的完好率有明显提高。

sentences.english: This paper studies on the inheritance of the stone cells in the pear flesh of the progeny hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了梨的杂种后代果肉中石细胞的遗传。

sentences.english: The other children called him a bastard because his parents never married.
sentences.chinese: 因为他父母没结婚，所以其他孩子叫他小杂种。
